is a fast growing city south of Arlington, between Dallas and Fort Worth.
(DFW) is the closest major Airport. Approximate travel time from DFW to downtown Mansfield is 45 minutes.
(DAL) is nearby in Dallas. Approximate travel time from Love Field to downtown Mansfield is 55 minutes.
is the closest private jetport. Approximate travel time from Spinks to downtown Mansfield is 25 minutes.
Mansfield is located off US 287 South of I-20.

Mansfield lacks public transportation.

There are several taxi and limo services that serve the Mansfield area. These can be located via the Yellow Pages. A sample of those services includes:
Kari's Limo & Taxi Service 817-458-4444
Quick Taxi Service 469-867-5426

value: content=An area of historic buildings, now occupied by boutique shopping and dining establishments as well as the offices of the Mansfield Chamber of Commerce and the Mansfield News-Mirror newspaper. The historic Farr Best Theater is located in this district.

content=Each October, the Mansfield Music & Arts Festival brings thousands of people together to enjoy concerts by bands from across the Metroplex and Texas. Main Street is blocked off to vehicular traffic in the Historic District, stages are erected, and dozens of local restaurants, shops and businesses set up temporary booths for this two-day celebration.
address=109 N. Main Street. Mansfield, TX 76063
directions=100 feet north of the intersection of Main St. and Broad St.

content=The Farr Best Theater was built in 1917. In 2007, the theater was restored to its original glory by the Meadows family. The theater provides an intimate, 153-seat venue with outstanding acoustics and state-of-the-art sound, lighting and AV systems.

The theater regularly hosts bands from across Texas, and it also hosts a music showcase, the Farr Best Opry, three Saturdays per month.
content=Many national lodging chains have hotels in Mansfield.
